name: Paris-Dakar Rally
synopsis: Each year, the world's bravest drivers come together to compete in the Paris-Dakar Rally, a grueling 7,000 mile trek across every imaginable terrain. They do battle in trucks, cars, motorbikes and ATVs, all striving for the honor of being called the ultimate off-road champion. Only the strong will durvive this battle of mude, sweat and gears!
